alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:05AM MST until December 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches * WHERE...Upper Sevier River Valleys, Bryce Canyon Country and South Central Utah. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on area routes through the morning hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys
